column1: This joint course will give an introduction to basic concepts as well as modern techniques and technologies in Molecular Medicine.

This course covers descriptive statistics, graphical methods, probability, probability distributions (normal, binomial and Poisson), sampling error, confidence intervals and basic hypothesis testing methods including the t-tests and chi-square tests.
This course covers ANOVA methods including one-way, two-way and repeated measures ANOVA, non-parametric hypothesis testing methods, correlation, linear regression and logistic regression.
